column38: View Tips: For more space on your screen, please minimize the ribbon by clicking on the "^" on the top right-hand corner of your screen or zoom out using the view controls on the bottom-right hand corner of your screen.

column1: Welcome to Financial Modeling and Valuation Step 3 of 7!
Change only the BLUE fonts, then go to Step 4 on the next tab.
column38: Note from Chris: Please make sure to close the groups by clicking on "1" to the left and slightly above column A or you will see quarterly numbers in this sparkline column.

column1: Orange Shaded Cells = Sparklines (for trend analysis)
Green = links to data from another tab
